# JD-Table / Demo's

JD-Table can be configured in many ways, below is a number of demos available to show variable layouts and use cases.

### Responsive
- [Default](https://jamesdruhan.github.io/vue-jd-table/demo/default.html)
- [Virtual Rendering (1,000 Rows)](https://jamesdruhan.github.io/vue-jd-table/demo/virtual1000.html)
- [Virtual Rendering (100,000 Rows)](https://jamesdruhan.github.io/vue-jd-table/demo/virtual100000.html)
- [Pagination Rendering (1,000 Rows)](https://jamesdruhan.github.io/vue-jd-table/demo/pagination1000.html)
- [Pagination Rendering (100,000 Rows)](https://jamesdruhan.github.io/vue-jd-table/demo/pagination100000.html)
- [Slim (Just Table Data)](https://jamesdruhan.github.io/vue-jd-table/demo/slim.html)

### Fixed
- [Small](https://jamesdruhan.github.io/vue-jd-table/demo/small.html)
